extendedInfo.description: Powerful feed reader with optional Feedly Integration.Search & preview feeds; read offline with images, mobile view, customizable interface.rss|atom|podcastsNews reader for RSS/Atom feeds equipped with Feed Search and other great features. Simply search for keywords or site name (e.g. 'sports news' or 'cnn'), tap the result to preview, add and enjoy!FEATURES:* Feedly Cloud sync ***NEW**** Read by feed/category/All ***NEW**** Tablet layout ***NEW**** Feed Search with Preview will allow you to build your feed library quickly and easily* Full-screen view with swipe and zoom that can be used as default reading mode* Supports saving articles to Pocket* Expandable list allows to read articles without leaving the list as well as read only articles that interest you* Offline reading with images (configured per feed) ensures that you can read even when not connected* One-click access to "mobilized" version of article for faster/easier web browsing* Ability to view article comments and subscribe to comments feeds* Widgets and shortcuts on home screen* Resizable widget or pick from one of 3 sizes* Each widget can be configured to rotate through selected feeds at set interval or manually* Choose between dark or light theme * Customizable storage, update frequency, notifications, etc. * Backup/restore to SD Note: To use widgets please install the app to internal memory, not SD.*** If you have a force-close or another bug unique to your device or configuration, PLEASE EMAIL THE DEVELOPER instead of posting in comments. If we cannot reproduce the problem we cannot fix it without your help! Thank you! ***

reviews.title: Used to love it until...
reviews.comment: the articles I place a star to save are no longer saved in the feed. Please restore the ability to save.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is my Google reader substitute
reviews.comment: Tried many but this is the simplest and best. Only thing missing is cross-device sync, but I get around that by browsing my feeds on my phone and saving articles to Pocket for cross-device synced reading.
reviews.author: Wilf Nicoll

reviews.title: The best but...
reviews.comment: The only rss reader I use. Please, please, please update the widget. Make it scrollable and theme able and also options for more layouts
reviews.author: Talha Hamid

reviews.title: I\'m using RSS junkie now
reviews.comment: I have been complaining about repeat feeds and sync issues ever since I\'ve purchased this app and the developer has not acknowledged the situation or respond to me about it. what a waste of two bucks. That\'s what happens when you try to save a couple of dollars you end up buying an inferior product. And a developer who does not care about your feedback
reviews.author: Steven Calcano

reviews.title: My fav!... So far..
reviews.comment: Deff a great app!.... but im not a huge fan of everything. Sometimes it\'ll load the same read articles over and over and the view isn\'t my favorite, but It links with Google and it has the download podcast feature so its my daily reader at the moment. Not to say it would take much to out do it.. plus the widgets are lame and not worth using!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best feed reader
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried them all and I keep coming back to this one because of its simple, easy to use design and its great widget.  I only wish the widget background was flat, without the bevel, and you could adjust the transparency. Maybe even theme it.
reviews.author: Terry Miller

reviews.title: My RSS reader
reviews.comment: This is the RSS reader I\'ve been using since the G1. Always very good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best rss reader available on Android
reviews.comment: This is a seriously good rss reader. I\'ve tried loads of different apps on Android, iOS and the Web and this app comes out in the top two or three overall. It\'s the most versatile product on Android and the only one that has the features I need,  such as full article sharing to evernote (not just links),  a good night reading mode, and flexible synchronisation settings.
reviews.author: Joseph Noble

reviews.title: Good reader, but craashes too much
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this since I first started using Android, but it seems less stable recently.  It crashes on my EVO 3D often.  On my Acer A500 (HC3.2) open articles \'flap\' around the screen, you have to chase them down to close them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worse after update...
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t keep starred articles in the feed anymore after pressing all read. That used to be a valuable function when you wanted to read an article later but remove all other articles from the feed. Please bring back this function! Other excellent
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent,  love FeedR
reviews.comment: I was a viigo die hard, and didn\'t want to leave blackberry in fear of not having it. Now I\'m really in love with this application, awesome app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best RSS reader available
reviews.comment: 5 stars if we can get notifications for selected feeds instead of general \"all feed notification\" Great app....font color options for app and widget would be cool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app!  Any chance of implementing Tiny Tiny RSS synching?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost there
reviews.comment: Version 3.0.4 is a nice update apart from getting the unread article counts in the notification bar completely wrong. Please fix this for 5 stars.
reviews.author: Stuart Bowman

reviews.title: Where\'d expand article go?
reviews.comment: I use this a lot and am disappointed that \"expand article\" is gone.  Sent dev an email regarding this. He got back with me right away and is working on it. Still my favorite news reader.
reviews.author: Suki Niko

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Notification seems to get new unread item count wrong since last update, otherwise easily the best and most customisable rss app
reviews.author: Keith Hall

reviews.title: Great app!!! Small footprint.
reviews.comment: I like the interface. I like that the size is small, under 600 kilobytes. Others on the market weigh in at a few megabytes! Totally unnecessary for them to be so bloated. This does what I need, including syncing, in a small package. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for almost three years, but the latest update makes the starred articles dissappear after you have read all the articles. Please fix for five stars. Other than that amazing app
reviews.author: fernando subillaga

reviews.title: Bring back the Comments view
reviews.comment: What happened to the comments button and in the menu? FIX please
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Starred aren\'t kept
reviews.comment: Made article starred is not keeping it
reviews.author: Adam Raszkiewicz
